summary:
Translating business requirements into functional and technical specifications,  profitable solutions and most important improve customer satisfaction are my specialty. 

Being the key of translation in needs between the marketing, IT , stakeholders and the customers gives me an overview as a leader of what a product needs to become a success. 

My role as head gives me the possibility to challenge my colleagues to be the very best at what they are specialised in. Listening,  making each better and creating an open, honest and safe environment is key to creating successful Business and Development teams. 

Think Big, start small!

projects.title: Sepa lastschrift integration with Twicky and Sofort for Alphacomm regarding there prepaid website Deutsche Telekom
projects.description:
Freelance assignment for Alphacomm regarding the integration of Sepa lastschrift with Twicky and Sofort for there prepaid top-up website www.telekom.de (Deutsche Telekom). 

In the prepaid auto top-up flow on www.telekom.de,  Alphacomm wants to integrate  Sepa lastschrift. 
The user needs to indentifty themselves by filling in there data, iBAN and they have to make a 0.01 eurocent transaction.  

My assignment is to translate the Technical flow to a functional flow), make the impact on the current flow minimal and deliver the wireframes to Alphacomm so that the implementation for back and front end would be easy and give my feedback as a product owner.

projects.title: Base (Belgium) pre-paid SIM registration
projects.description:
In May 2016 the Belgian government has decided to move ahead with a plan which will force all users of pre-paid mobile SIM cards to register their details in an effort to restrict the use of anonymous phones for terrorist or criminal activities. 

I as product owner in collobaration with my team made the flow and wireframes to make a proposition regarding the implementation of the eID check for the Belgium provider Base.

projects.title: T-Mobile PrePaid (Windows Phone 8.1 app)
projects.description:
Windows Phone 8.1 applicatie in opdracht van Alphacomm Prepaid Services voor T-Mobile beltegoed direct te kunnen opwaarderen.

T-Mobile PrePaid Opwaarderen

Snel, gemakkelijk en veilig je PrePaid opwaarderen waar en wanneer je maar wilt. Dat kan met de T-Mobile PrePaid Opwaardeer App van Alphacomm. Na het downloaden van de App kan je direct je eigen mobiel of tablet opwaarderen. 

Ook is het mogelijk om het T-Mobile PrePaid 06-nummer van je familie of vrienden op te waarderen.

Hoe werkt het?

1) Selecteer het gewenste T-Mobile PrePaid tegoed dat je wilt opwaarderen
2) Vul het T-Mobile PrePaid nummer in dat je wilt opwaarderen en je e-mail adres
3) Kies de manier van betalen; iDeal, creditcard of PayPal
4) Je PrePaid tegoed wordt na de succesvolle betaling direct opgewaardeerd, je hoeft geen codes meer in te vullen
5) Je ontvangt de bevestiging dat je opwaardering is gelukt op je scherm en per e-mail

Key functionaliteiten: 
- Altijd en overal veilig opwaarderen over mobiel internet en/of WIFI
- Opwaarderen van je T-Mobile PrePaid tegoed voor je smartphone of tablet
- Je hoeft niet in te loggen om te bestellen
- In-App support met de klantenservice van Alphacomm
- Meer informatie over betaalmethodes
- Informatie over provider acties

Extra functionaliteiten na registratie:
- Gegevens worden automatisch ingevuld, na het selecteren van betaalmethode
- Makkelijk opnieuw bestellen
- Volledige bestelhistorie altijd terug te vinden
- Mogelijkheid om je gegevens op te slaan en te wijzigen
- Mogelijkheid om je wachtwoord te wijzigen

projects.title: Developing, redesigning and maintaining our B2C websites/apps
projects.description:
One of Alphacomm's  ongoing projects is maintaining and evolving the B2C prepaid topup websites and in three different countries. 

The Netherlands:  www.opwaarderen.nl
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/nl/app/opwaarderen-nl-beltegoed/id567420751?mt=8
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.sharewire.alphacomm

Germany: www.aufladen.de
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/de/app/aufladen-guthaben-app/id586218725?mt=8
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.sharewire.alphacomm.aufladen

Belgium: www.herladen.be
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/be/app/herladen-be-belkrediet/id655591762?mt=8
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.sharewire.alphacomm.herladen

USA: www.usaprepaid.com

In the past years I managed the front end team to keep the websites/apps up to date regarding the latest trends.  We made the websites responsive and mobile friendly using native elements to keep and improve our high conversion rate on the different websites/apps.  

In collaboration with the stakeholders, I did some product management and found suppliers so that we could add new categories to our Prepaid website like : Internet, Gaming and Giftcards. We added brands like iTunes, Google Play, Xbox , Playstation and many more to boost our sales.

projects.title: Development of our 30 app strategy
projects.description:
Product Owner (Apps)

- Keeping the backlog
- Converting the requirements of our stakeholders to acceptable and adaptable solutions. 
- Wireframing + Designing our multibrand app strategy
- Improving and updating current apps with new features. 
- Doing research of the latest trends regarding the App market and adapting this to our current   
  apps.
- Marketing(aso/social/sea/seo)

We have launched 30 apps per platform (iOS + Android) for our B2C brands. After this launch partners like Telekom Deutschland/ Vodafone Deutschland/o2 Deutschland, T-Mobile Netherlands, Lebara Netherlands and Ortel Belgium contacted us either to take over our branded app or to request a custom app.

profile_positions.title: Head of Product

profile_positions.description:
Money Transfer screen | My ING | SEPA | International Payments | Iban - Name Check | OneWeb + OneAPP | Instant Payments

I am the Product Owner of my team Crafty Unicorns and Chief Product Owner Payment Products. My team is responsible for the transfer screen, payment basket and order overview within the My ING platform. We are a part of the Tribe Payments and are responsible for making sure the customers have a smooth customer experience regarding making a Payment and innovate our features to the next level. 

Projects: 

1. Instant Payments: Integrated and make Instant Payments available for customers within My ING. In a nutshell: Real-time money transfer between accounts of different banks. 

2.  SEPA: Making sure that our screens are compliant regarding the Sepa Rulebook. 

3. International Payments: Improved the International Payments flow to one payment screen. Integrate quote of the cost, flat flee and a faster processing of the international payment. 

4.  OneWeb + OneApp: 
    Working cross-border to roll-out one platform towards multiple countries like Netherlands, Belgium and Luxembourg. Keep in mind continuous improvement of payment products and customer 
    satisfaction. Enable payments functionalities like: Instant Payments, Iban Name Check,  international payments, payment basket, standing orders and address book in multiple countries. 


5. Continues Improving the My ING platform regarding Payments using direct client feedback per owned feature. Also looking into A11Y and make the platform available and usable for everyone. 

6. IBAN- Name Check: Integrate the IBAN-Name Check in My ING to prevent Fraud and ensuring the security of the customers payments. 

7. Organised the first Cross-Border Payments Tribe Day Event for 500 plus colleagues

8. Organising the recurring Monthly Payments Demo for colleagues of Payments to present their deliverables.

9. Set-up and develop 24/7 Payments standby and extent it to different tribes.

• Product Owner App and Web (E-commerce) (planning & prioritizing of the road map)

• Converting Technical requirements to Functional and UI designs

• Reviewing Business and Technical requirements to create a better product
• Responsible for the stability and continuity of the apps and web interfaces. Making sure the teams follow quality standards
• New business analyses
• Product Management, research the current market and look for suppliers and possibilities to expand the product assortment
• Creating business analyses regarding development, improvement and marketing
• Defining/aligning strategic goals through business-case development and reporting
• Implementing and improving current interfaces by taking the results of A/B testing, analytics and client behaviours as measuring stick
• Defining Customer Journeys
• Creating demo’s to support stakeholders in sales
• Be a consultant for B2B clients like Telekom, Vodafone, o2 Germany, T- Mobile, Lebara Netherlands, 
   Ortel and Lycamobile Belgium
• Taking full ownership of the products

profile_positions.description:
Games Factory Online wants to expand and relaunch one of there mobile apps that currently is only available on iOs. 

For my paper i have done research about the current mobile gaming market, the platforms and the app stores. Included a prediction and a summary of changes in the upcoming years. I also managed to hold a customer survey to see what the consumers think of the current app. 

The research was necessary to make recommendations like how to improve the app and where to invest in in the near future.

Thesis 8.5/10
